posts.post_content: Hey guys what does this card sell for and im talking beater. My mailman this is his great great grandfather and he was looking for an original card for his collection and I said I would love to help. Hey he is the guy who brings me my cards haha. Anyway any out there or what they selling for
i'm guessing if you found one that a dog ate and regurgitated, maybe $150?   Neat that your mailman is related, good luck!

Billy Hamilton has a really nice looking N300.  They're really pricy but If you can find one that's had some re-coloring on the border you might be able to get it for around 500-700.  Beater OJs are pretty ugly.  If you can find one with the ad cut off for pay around 200-300ish
